sentences.en: Like his forefather, Benny had the ability to foresee the future.
sentences.cn: 像他的祖先一样, 本尼有能力预知将来.

sentences.en: NIV We have lived in tents and have fully obeyed everything our forefather Jonadab commanded us.
sentences.cn: [和合]但住帐棚,听从我们先祖约拿达的话,照他所吩咐我们的去行.

sentences.en: They settled in Leshem and named it Dan after their forefather.
sentences.cn: 因为但人上去攻取利善,用刀击杀城中的人,得了那城,住在其中,以他们先祖但的名将利善改名为但.

sentences.en: They were determined to go back to the land of their forefathers.
sentences.cn: 他们决意要回到老祖宗的土地。

sentences.en: We have lived in tents and have fully obeyed everything our forefather Jonadab commanded us.
sentences.cn: 但住帐棚,听从我们先祖约拿达的话,照他所吩咐我们的去行.

sentences.en: What then shall we say that Abraham, our forefather according to the flesh, has found?
sentences.cn: 罗四1这样, 我们可说我们的祖宗亚伯拉罕照著肉体得了 什么 ?

sentences.en: What then shall we say that Abraham, our forefather, discovered in this matter?
sentences.cn: 2倘若亚伯拉罕是因行为称义,就有可夸的;只是在神面前并无可夸.

sentences.en: Your first forefather sinned, And your spokesmen have transgressed against Me.
sentences.cn: 赛43:27你的始祖犯罪 、 你的师傅违背我.

trans.tran_en: the people, especially men, who were part of your family a long time ago in the past
